name: PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour
name_original: PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour
description:
PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour is a sports game developed by Rebellion. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by O-Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour is available on PlayStation 3.
